channel.title: 10 Years Ago
channel.description:
As all of you should know, 10 years ago today, terrorists hijacked planes and crashed them into the World Trade Center towers in New York, the Pentagon building in Washington DC, and a fourth plane went down in a field in Pennsylvania thanks to the heroic sacrifice made by those on that plane.
About three thousand lives were lost that day. The Pentagon has since been repaired and the site of the WTC is now a memorial park.
After 9/11, I went down to DC to see the Pentagon and there was still a large gash in the side. It was heartbreaking.
To those that lost someone or know someone that lost someone, my heart goes out to you and yours. I cannot imagine what you must be going through right now.
[i](Note: If you are not interested in this topic, you are free to explore many other topics on this forum. Thank you.)[/SIZE][/i]

item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

You know what was three times worse than “7/7” and only half as long ago? 26/11.

Do you give it six times the thought? Do you remember the tragedy any better? No? Then shut the fuck up.

Bscly. All of these things are heavily national events. We don’t bitch when people mourn attacks in their home country, don’t come bitch when we mourn ours. We aren’t asking you to join in.

Fancy is still just an idiot.

item.title: 10 Years Ago
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Medevilae:

retarded

Amazing. That’s exactly what one can conceive about your own precious person just from from reading on your posts here.
What makes it worse is that you perceive yourself as smart.

Medevilae:

More so if you believe it was a plot conspired by the government.

I didn’t say anything about the government. I told exactly what everyone knows. I said that this shit stank.
Congratulations on stepping right into your own pile of turd.

How does that mean I said that the terrorist attacks were because the US was on top? I said it’s a known fact that people always come after who’s on top, and I meant people who always have snide comments about the US and how it’s evil and oh what a terrible country it is. Maybe people misinterpreted what I said.

What syllable of ‘dipshit’ don’t you understand?
